explanation:
code_hardening: Added explicit null checks at the start of the method with the required semantics: both nulls return 0; first null returns Integer.MIN_VALUE; second null returns Integer.MAX_VALUE.
resolve_compilation_errors: Changed the method signature to compare(String version1, String version2), removed Object casts, and updated all tokenizer iteration calls from MoveNext() to moveNext() to match the existing VersionTokenizer API so callers (equals, isAtLeast) compile correctly.
exception_handling: none.
logic_customization: Integrated the null-handling logic without altering the original version comparison behavior; preserved numeric-first comparison, suffix emptiness rules, and lexical suffix comparison exactly as in the original logic.
refactoring: Updated parameter names and local usage to work directly with String inputs instead of Object, with no behavioral refactor beyond what was required by the signature change.
misc: none.
